languages.text: "Все, что я делаю, я стараюсь делать хорошо". {n}Арбитр прищуривается, извлекая из инструмента прихотливый пассаж одной рукой и убрав за спину другую.{/n} "Даже идеально".

traits.locale_text: все что я делаю стараюсь делать хорошо

languages.text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."
languages.original_text: "Все, что я делаю, я стараюсь делать хорошо". {n}Арбитр прищуривается, извлекая из инструмента прихотливый пассаж одной рукой и убрав за спину другую.{/n} "Даже идеально".

"Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

languages.text: 「私は、すべてのことを上手くやろうと心がけています」{n}ソロモーンは片手で楽器から複雑な旋律を引き出しながら、もう一方の手を背中に回し、目元にわずかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「できれば完璧に」
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、すべてのことを上手くやろうと心がけています」{n}ソロモーンは片手で楽器から複雑な旋律を引き出しながら、もう一方の手を背中に回し、目元にわずかな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「できれば完璧に」

languages.text: "Alles, was ich tue, will ich gut machen." {n}Solomornes Augen werden schmal, als er dem Instrument mit einer Hand eine komplexe Passage entlockt, während er die andere auf den Rücken gelegt hat.{/n} "Vorzugsweise sogar perfekt."
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was ich tue, will ich gut machen." {n}Solomornes Augen werden schmal, als er dem Instrument mit einer Hand eine komplexe Passage entlockt, während er die andere auf den Rücken gelegt hat.{/n} "Vorzugsweise sogar perfekt."

languages.text: « Tout ce que je fais, je m'efforce de bien le faire. » {n}Les yeux de Solomorne se plissent alors qu'il joue un passage complexe d'une seule main tout en gardant l'autre dans son dos.{/n} « Parfaitement, même. »
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que je fais, je m'efforce de bien le faire. » {n}Les yeux de Solomorne se plissent alors qu'il joue un passage complexe d'une seule main tout en gardant l'autre dans son dos.{/n} « Parfaitement, même. »

languages.text: «Procuro hacer bien todo lo que hago». {n}Solomorne entorna los ojos y toca una frase especialmente compleja de la pieza con una sola mano mientras se lleva la otra a la espalda.{/n} «A la perfección, si puedo».
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: «Procuro hacer bien todo lo que hago». {n}Solomorne entorna los ojos y toca una frase especialmente compleja de la pieza con una sola mano mientras se lleva la otra a la espalda.{/n} «A la perfección, si puedo».

languages.text: “无论做什么事情，我的目标都是做得很好。”{n}索罗蒙眼角浮起了皱纹，单手弹起了曲子的复杂段落，将另一只手背在了身后。{/n}“甚至是完美无缺。”
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: “无论做什么事情，我的目标都是做得很好。”{n}索罗蒙眼角浮起了皱纹，单手弹起了曲子的复杂段落，将另一只手背在了身后。{/n}“甚至是完美无缺。”

languages.text: "Ne iş yaparsam yapayım, en iyisini hedeflerim." {n}Solomorne gözlerini kısıyor. Tek eliyle karmaşık bir pasaj çalarken ötekini arkasına koyuyor.{/n} "Mükemmel iş çıkarmaya çalışırım."
languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."

traits.locale_text: "Ne iş yaparsam yapayım, en iyisini hedeflerim." {n}Solomorne gözlerini kısar. Tek eliyle karmaşık bir pasaj çalarken ötekini arkasına koyar.{/n} "Mükemmelen yapmayı gaye edinirim."

languages.original_text: "Everything I do, I aim to do well." {n}Solomorne's eyes crease as he draws out an intricate passage from the instrument with one hand while tucking the other behind his back.{/n} "Perfectly, even."
